queryStringParameters.plot: who meets by fate ,  shall be sealed by fate . theresa osborne is running along the beach when she stumbles upon a bottle washed up on the shore .  inside is a message ,  reading the letter she feels so moved and yet she felt as if she has violated someone ' s thoughts . in love with a man she has never met ,  theresa tracks down the author of the letter to a small town in wilmington ,  two lovers with crossed paths .  but yet one can ' t let go of their past .
